lead_paragraph: DRAPKIN--Donald. The Board and Staff of Lincoln Center Theater are deeply saddened by the death of our longtime Board Member, Donald Drapkin. He was a great champion of our Theater -- generous, enthusiastic, irreverent, and funny. He had recently been designated an LCT Honorary Trustee, and he was very proud to have been admitted into such distinguished company. We send sympathy and love to Sue and his entire family. J. Tomilson Hill, Chairman Eric M. Mindich, President Andre Bishop, Producing Artistic Director 1/3
